# Brewery (Building)
## Overview
**Brewery**

**Create** 36 Goods, 3 Influence, 32 Labor (1,450 gp)

**Rooms** 1 [[Bar (Room)|Bar]], 1 [[Brewery (Room)|Brewery]], 1 [[Kitchen (Room)|Kitchen]], 1 [[Office (Room)|Office]], 2 [[Storage (Room)|Storages]], 1 [[Workstation (Room)|Workstation]]

A building for beer and ale brewing, winemaking, distilling, or some similar use.
